I’m an Associate Professor with the Faculty of Mechanical & Electrical Engineering, Kunming University of Science and Technology (KUST), Kunming, China. I received the B.S. and M.S. degrees from School of Automation, Beijing Institute of Technology, Beijing, China, and the Ph.D. degree in Computing and Information Sciences from B. Thomas Golisano College of Computing and Information Sciences, Rochester Institute of Technology, Rochester, NY, USA. Before I joined KUST, I held the position of Research Fellow first with the School of Computer Science and Engineering, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, and then with the Faculty of Engineering, Bar Ilan University, Israel. I was listed in Stanford University’s 2024 World’s Top 2% Scientists list.



Intelligent maintenance and planning for production lines.
Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) networking and resource allocation.
Machine learning-driven complex signal processing.
Agent AI for autononous systems.






Janurary 29, 2026, a student paper “World Model-driven Process Industry Operations: An Offline Reinforcement Learning Solution based on Conditional Diffusion” was accepted by Elesvier Computers in Industry.

November 01, 2025: a student paper “Distributed State Estimation with Two Event- triggered Communication Strategies via Internet of Underwater Things,” was accepted by IEEE Internet of Things Journal, see the source code for simulation experiments: [Simulation Code].
September 15, 2025, a student paper “Deep learning-based prediction of optimal surface texturing parameters for water-lubricated SiC” was accepted by Journal of Tribology international.

title: 中文页
text:
王闻博 于2016年在美国罗切斯特理工学院获得计算与信息科学专业的博士学位，之前于北京理工大学获自动化专业学士学位和导航制导与控制专业硕士学位。他于2016至2022年之间分别在新加坡南洋理工大学和以色列巴伊兰大学担任研究员，之后于2022年12月加入昆明理工大学机电工程学院任专任教师至今，现任昆明理工大学机电工程学院智能制造工程系副教授，并兼任智能制造工程系副主任。王闻博目前是电子电气工程师学会高级会员（IEEE Senior Member）,也是中国计算机学会和自动化学会的专业会员。他迄今累计发表近60篇同行评议的期刊、会议论文及学术专著章节，并曾担任多个学术期刊的客座编辑以及国际学术会议的组委会或学术委员会成员。

title: 中文页
text:
招生/毕业情况

每年指导名额：本科生 (6 名)；学/专硕 (4-5 名)。
研究生毕业要求：至少发表一篇IEEE会议论文，学硕需在此之外发表一篇IEEE期刊论文。
指导频次：每周以专题报告形式开展1次集体组会；研一/研二学生要求至少每周1次一对一约谈讨论；组内学生开题及中期考核等归入机电工程学院“先进材料成形制造”大团队统一管理。
组内工作风格：

基本要求：自我驱动，严谨求是；请勿空谈。
组内资源有限，无法支持硕士学生个人自主选择课题方向。
学生在承诺毕业风险自担的前提下可以选择以个人身份外出实习，从2026年起导师不再推荐企业实习机会。

毕业生情况统计：

2025年-（1）硕士生：暂无；（2）本科生5人：3人升学，其中1人获“昆明理工大学校级优秀毕业论文”奖；1人（留学生）肄业。
